Doc: A type to capture details relevant to the calculation of the floating price.

Source.Contents:
/#
   A type to capture details relevant to the calculation of the floating price.
 #/
record FpML5.confirmation.FloatingLegCalculation {
  # Commodity Pricing Dates.
  pricingDates : FpML5.confirmation.CommodityPricingDates

  # The parties may specify a Method of Averaging where more than one pricing Dates is being specified as being applicable.
  averagingMethod : string?

  # If the Notional Quantity is specified in units that do not match the units in which the Commodity Reference Price is quoted, the scaling or conversion factor used to convert the Commodity Reference Price units into the Notional Quantity units should be stated here. If there is no conversion, this element is not intended to be used.
  conversionFactor : decimal?

  # Rounding direction and precision for price values.
  rounding : FpML5.confirmation.Rounding?

  # The spread over or under the Commodity Reference Price for this leg of the trade.
  spread : FpML5.confirmation.CommoditySpread

  # The spread over or under the Commodity Reference Price for this leg of the trade for each Calculation Period.
  spreadSchedule : FpML5.confirmation.CommoditySpreadSchedule

  # The spread percentage over or under the Commodity Reference Price for this leg of the trade.
  spreadPercentage : decimal

  # Defines how observations of FX prices are to be used to calculate a factor with which to convert the observed Commodity Reference Price to the Settlement Currency.
  fx : FpML5.confirmation.CommodityFx?

}

averagingMethod.Doc: The parties may specify a Method of Averaging where more than one pricing Dates is being specified as being applicable.
averagingMethod.Name: averagingMethod

conversionFactor.Doc: If the Notional Quantity is specified in units that do not match the units in which the Commodity Reference Price is quoted, the scaling or conversion factor used to convert the Commodity Reference Price units into the Notional Quantity units should be stated here. If there is no conversion, this element is not intended to be used.
conversionFactor.Name: conversionFactor

rounding.Doc: Rounding direction and precision for price values.
rounding.Name: rounding

spread.Doc: The spread over or under the Commodity Reference Price for this leg of the trade.
spread.Name: spread

spreadSchedule.Doc: The spread over or under the Commodity Reference Price for this leg of the trade for each Calculation Period.
spreadSchedule.Name: spreadSchedule

spreadPercentage.Doc: The spread percentage over or under the Commodity Reference Price for this leg of the trade.
spreadPercentage.Name: spreadPercentage

fx.Doc: Defines how observations of FX prices are to be used to calculate a factor with which to convert the observed Commodity Reference Price to the Settlement Currency.
fx.Name: fx
